name: Alex Wilson (@probablyfine@tech.lgbt)
summary:
After a long hiatus, I have enough time and headspace to start maintaining adr-viewer again.

I spent some time this weekend merging contributor PRs, clearing out old stuff (Travis CI who?), and setting up automated releases.

1.4.0rc1 is now on PyPI and I'm looking forward to giving this project the attention it deserves again.

#python 

https://github.com/mrwilson/adr-viewer
